My Resume

Professional Summary

A highly motivated junior software engineer with strong experience in full-stack development. Adept at building dynamic web applications using JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more.

Skills

  • JavaScript (ES6+)
  • React
  • Node.js
  • HTML/CSS
  • MongoDB

Experience

  • Junior Software Engineer - XYZ Corp | June 2023 - Present

    Worked on a variety of full-stack projects using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

  • Intern Developer - ABC Inc. | June 2022 - August 2022

    Contributed to the development of several web applications and performed bug fixes.

Education

Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Iowa State University

Graduated: May 2023

Download My Resume
